if.test: item != null and item.name !=null and (fieldColMap[item.name.toUpperCase()] != null or orderMap[item.order.toUpperCase()]!=null)

mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM AUTH_ORGANIZATION
AND ID = #{vo.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{vo.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') AND PARENT_ID = #{vo.parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ROOT_ID = #{vo.rootId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{vo.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') AND IS_USE_ROOT_MENU = #{vo.isUseRootMenu,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND TYPE1 = #{vo.type1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND TYPE2 = #{vo.type2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DESCRIPTION = #{vo.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND UPDATE_TIME = #{vo.updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CREATE_TIME = #{vo.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO AUTH_ORGANIZATION ( ID, NAME, PARENT_ID, ROOT_ID, CODE, IS_USE_ROOT_MENU, TYPE1, TYPE2, DESCRIPTION, UPDATE_TIME, CREATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rootId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isUseRootMenu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
)
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT AuthOrganization.* FROM AUTH_ORGANIZATION AuthOrganization INNER JOIN AUTH_AUTHER_MENU AuthAutherMenu ON AuthOrganization.ID = AuthAutherMenu.AUTHER_ID INNER JOIN AUTH_MENU AuthMenu ON AuthMenu.ID = AuthAutherMenu.MENU_ID
AND AuthOrganization.ID = #{vo.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthOrganization.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{vo.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') AND AuthOrganization.PARENT_ID = #{vo.parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthOrganization.ROOT_ID = #{vo.rootId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthOrganization.CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{vo.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') AND AuthOrganization.IS_USE_ROOT_MENU = #{vo.isUseRootMenu,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthOrganization.TYPE1 = #{vo.type1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthOrganization.TYPE2 = #{vo.type2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthOrganization.DESCRIPTION = #{vo.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthOrganization.UPDATE_TIME = #{vo.updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthOrganization.CREATE_TIME = #{vo.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthMenu.ID = #{AuthMenu.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthMenu.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{AuthMenu.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') AND AuthMenu.RESOURCE_ID = #{AuthMenu.resourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthMenu.TYPE1 = #{AuthMenu.type1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthMenu.TYPE2 = #{AuthMenu.type2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthMenu.PARENT_ID = #{AuthMenu.parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthMenu.ROOT_ID = #{AuthMenu.rootId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthMenu.MENU_INDEX = #{AuthMenu.menuIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND AuthMenu.MAX_LEVEL = #{AuthMenu.maxLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND AuthMenu.ICO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{AuthMenu.ico,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') AND AuthMenu.DESCRIPTION = #{AuthMenu.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthMenu.UPDATE_TIME = #{AuthMenu.updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthMenu.CREATE_TIME = #{AuthMenu.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT DISTINCT AuthOrganization.* FROM AUTH_ORGANIZATION AuthOrganization INNER JOIN AUTH_ORGANIZATION_USER AuthOrganizationUser ON AuthOrganization.ID = AuthOrganizationUser.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN AUTH_USER AuthUser ON AuthUser.ID = AuthOrganizationUser.USER_ID
AND AuthOrganization.ID = #{vo.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthOrganization.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{vo.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') AND AuthOrganization.PARENT_ID = #{vo.parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthOrganization.ROOT_ID = #{vo.rootId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthOrganization.CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{vo.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') AND AuthOrganization.IS_USE_ROOT_MENU = #{vo.isUseRootMenu,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthOrganization.TYPE1 = #{vo.type1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthOrganization.TYPE2 = #{vo.type2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthOrganization.DESCRIPTION = #{vo.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthOrganization.UPDATE_TIME = #{vo.updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthOrganization.CREATE_TIME = #{vo.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthUser.ID = #{AuthUser.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthUser.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{AuthUser.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') AND AuthUser.STATUS LIKE CONCAT('%',#{AuthUser.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') AND AuthUser.TYPE = #{AuthUser.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthUser.TEL = #{AuthUser.tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthUser.EMAIL LIKE CONCAT('%',#{AuthUser.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') AND AuthUser.SEX LIKE CONCAT('%',#{AuthUser.sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') AND AuthUser.BIRTHDAY = #{AuthUser.birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthUser.FAMILY_ADDR = #{AuthUser.familyAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthUser.WORK_ADDR = #{AuthUser.workAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthUser.WORK_TEL = #{AuthUser.workTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthUser.DESCRIPTION = #{AuthUser.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthUser.UPDATE_TIME = #{AuthUser.updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthUser.CREATE_TIME = #{AuthUser.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT DISTINCT AuthOrganization.* FROM AUTH_ORGANIZATION AuthOrganization INNER JOIN AUTH_AUTHER_ROLE AuthAutherRole ON AuthOrganization.ID = AuthAutherRole.AUTHER_ID INNER JOIN AUTH_ROLE AuthRole ON AuthRole.ID = AuthAutherRole.ROLE_ID
AND AuthOrganization.ID = #{vo.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthOrganization.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{vo.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') AND AuthOrganization.PARENT_ID = #{vo.parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthOrganization.ROOT_ID = #{vo.rootId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthOrganization.CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{vo.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') AND AuthOrganization.IS_USE_ROOT_MENU = #{vo.isUseRootMenu,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthOrganization.TYPE1 = #{vo.type1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthOrganization.TYPE2 = #{vo.type2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthOrganization.DESCRIPTION = #{vo.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthOrganization.UPDATE_TIME = #{vo.updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthOrganization.CREATE_TIME = #{vo.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthRole.ID = #{AuthRole.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthRole.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{AuthRole.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') AND AuthRole.CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{AuthRole.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') AND AuthRole.TYPE1 = #{AuthRole.type1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthRole.TYPE2 = #{AuthRole.type2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthRole.STATUS LIKE CONCAT('%',#{AuthRole.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') AND AuthRole.DESCRIPTION = #{AuthRole.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthRole.UPDATE_TIME = #{AuthRole.updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthRole.CREATE_TIME = #{AuthRole.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthRole.RESOURCE_ID = #{AuthRole.resourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AuthRole.MENU_ID = #{AuthRole.menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT count(*) FROM AUTH_ORGANIZATION
NAME = #{vo.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ID <> #{vo.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT count(*) FROM AUTH_ORGANIZATION
CODE = #{vo.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ID <> #{vo.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
